DOC.brief_summary: BI 655064 will be administered subcutaneously once weekly in patients with immune thrombocytopenic purpura (ITP) for up to 12 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: Multiple Rising Does Study (Subcutaneous Doses) of BI 655064 in Male and Female Patients With Chronic Primary Immune Thrombocytopenic Purpura (ITP).
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Male and female chronic immune ITP patients Exclusion criteria: Any treatment of ITP excluded except for a stable dose of corticosteroids (up to 20 mg)
